definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
Tse Ting-Fung or Nicholas Tse (1980-), Cantopop star
Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
to apologize for an offense/to offer one's apology for a fault
Xie He (479-502), portrait painter from Qi of Southern dynasties 南齊
expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement

sentences.chinese: 哈蒙德夫人问，“为什么谢我？”

sentences.english: No thanks. I‘d rather run Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 不，谢了，我宁愿去掌管伊拉克。

sentences.english: What's more, I have got what I need. It is I that should thank you.
sentences.chinese: 再说，我也分得一杯羹，应该谢你才对。

sentences.english: I could never thank you enough.
And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他夺了哈大利谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌带到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Just what is this desire, this wish that Xie Nanxing brands 'romantic'?
sentences.chinese: 谢南星评价为“浪漫”的这种欲望或希望到底是什么？

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他夺了哈大底谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌，带到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: When Tou king of Hamath heard that David had defeated the whole army of Hadadezer, king of Zobah.
sentences.chinese: 哈马王陀乌听见大卫杀败琐巴王哈大利谢的全军。

sentences.english: Thank you . I'll call back later.
sentences.chinese: 谢了，我等一会儿再打过来。

sentences.english: And this has been deeply reflected in his poems .
sentences.chinese: 这在谢榛的诗作中有着深刻的反映。

sentences.english: Of Dan; Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.
sentences.chinese: 属但的，有亚米沙代的儿子亚希以谢。

sentences.english: Scherdel said the first flight was a familiarization flight for he and the team.
sentences.chinese: 谢尔德说这次首航对他和队友们来说是轻车熟路。

sentences.english: Cheryl here’s the buck I borrowed from you yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 谢里尔，这是我昨天向你借的一块钱。
谢了，我男朋友送的，来，洒些试试。

sentences.english: He is also admitted to practice in the United States of America, and has practiced American law for over 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 谢博士也考取美国律师并执行美国律师业务逾25年。

sentences.english: David took the gold shields carried by the officers of Hadadezer and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他夺了哈大利谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌带到耶路撒冷。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
